long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Data collection doesn't need to be hard. We make it easy. 

Convert any website to Excel in just a few clicks. Speed up your data collection and put your time and effort into what really matters to you.

With 250,000+ installs and more than 56.0M URL downloads globally, Listly is the easiest tool to use and the preferred web scraping service among marketers and real estate agents who want to get their job done faster.

See more features at www.listly.io.


Listly use cases

â€¢	Look for suitable job candidates as a recruiter
â€¢	Complete prospecting workflows as a sales representative
â€¢	Collect product and pricing information from eCommerce websites as a marketer
â€¢	Gather sports data to predict the outcome of sports games as a sports statistician
â€¢	Generate new leads for companies and freelancers
â€¢	Analyze social media posts, comments, likes, etc.
â€¢	Track real estate prices and listing information
â€¢	Identify potential competitors and monitor markets
â€¢	Scrape movie reviews and ratings
â€¢	Crawl various search engine results


Listly Free Features
â€¢	â­NEW ğŸ–¼ï¸ Image Downloader â€“ Download images instantly! 
â€¢	Export data to Excel (XLSX) files
â€¢	Integrate with Google Sheets
â€¢	Automatically detect and extract iFrame elements
â€¢	Extract hyperlinks referring to other web pages

Listly Premium Features

â€¢	Export multiple pages into an Excel spreadsheet
â€¢	Schedule daily extractions
â€¢	Receive email notifications
â€¢	Integrate with an API for developers (Beta)
â€¢	Export data in CSV/JSON format
â€¢	Upload .html files via Fileboard
â€¢	Automate repetitive mouse or keyboard clicks to load more data
â€¢	Auto-click to load more data
â€¢	Auto-scroll to load more data
â€¢	Auto-save while scrolling
â€¢	Add a custom proxy server to change IP address and avoid getting blocked
â€¢	Adjust the scraping speed to avoid getting blocked while scraping websites
